sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT A.CNTC_ID, A.TEST_CLASS_NM, A.MNGR_NM, A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES, A.MNTRNG_STTUS, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREAT_DT, B.CODE_NM MNTRNG_STTUS_NM, C.CNTC_NM, D.INSTT_NM PROVD_INSTT_NM, E.SYS_NM PROVD_SYS_NM, F.SVC_NM PROVD_SVC_NM, G.INSTT_NM REQUST_INSTT_NM, H.SYS_NM REQUST_SYS_NM FROM COMTNTRSMRCVMNTRNG A, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B, COMTNSYSTEMCNTC C, COMTNCNTCINSTT D, COMTNCNTCSYSTEM E, COMTNCNTCSERVICE F, COMTNCNTCINSTT G, COMTNCNTCSYSTEM H WHERE B.CODE_ID = 'COM046' AND A.MNTRNG_STTUS = B.CODE AND A.CNTC_ID = C.CNTC_ID AND D.INSTT_ID = C.PROVD_INSTT_ID AND E.INSTT_ID = C.PROVD_INSTT_ID AND E.SYS_ID = C.PROVD_SYS_ID AND F.INSTT_ID = C.PROVD_INSTT_ID AND F.SYS_ID = C.PROVD_SYS_ID AND F.SVC_ID = C.PROVD_SVC_ID AND G.INSTT_ID = C.REQUST_INSTT_ID AND H.INSTT_ID = C.REQUST_INSTT_ID AND H.SYS_ID = C.REQUST_SYS_ID AND A.CNTC_ID = C.CNTC_ID
C.CNTC_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
A.CNTC_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
A.MNGR_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
B.CODE_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY A.CNTC_ID ASC ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNTRSMRCVMNTRNG A, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B, COMTNSYSTEMCNTC C, COMTNCNTCINSTT D, COMTNCNTCSYSTEM E, COMTNCNTCSERVICE F, COMTNCNTCINSTT G, COMTNCNTCSYSTEM H WHERE B.CODE_ID = 'COM046' AND A.MNTRNG_STTUS = B.CODE AND A.CNTC_ID = C.CNTC_ID AND D.INSTT_ID = C.PROVD_INSTT_ID AND E.INSTT_ID = C.PROVD_INSTT_ID AND E.SYS_ID = C.PROVD_SYS_ID AND F.INSTT_ID = C.PROVD_INSTT_ID AND F.SYS_ID = C.PROVD_SYS_ID AND F.SVC_ID = C.PROVD_SVC_ID AND G.INSTT_ID = C.REQUST_INSTT_ID AND H.INSTT_ID = C.REQUST_INSTT_ID AND H.SYS_ID = C.REQUST_SYS_ID AND A.CNTC_ID = C.CNTC_ID
C.CNTC_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
A.CNTC_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
A.MNGR_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT A.CNTC_ID, A.TEST_CLASS_NM, A.MNGR_NM, A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES, A.MNTRNG_STTUS, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREAT_DT, B.CODE_NM MNTRNG_STTUS_NM, C.CNTC_NM, D.INSTT_NM PROVD_INSTT_NM, E.SYS_NM PROVD_SYS_NM, F.SVC_NM PROVD_SVC_NM, G.INSTT_NM REQUST_INSTT_NM, H.SYS_NM REQUST_SYS_NM FROM COMTNTRSMRCVMNTRNG A, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B, COMTNSYSTEMCNTC C, COMTNCNTCINSTT D, COMTNCNTCSYSTEM E, COMTNCNTCSERVICE F, COMTNCNTCINSTT G, COMTNCNTCSYSTEM H WHERE B.CODE_ID = 'COM046' AND A.MNTRNG_STTUS = B.CODE AND A.CNTC_ID = C.CNTC_ID AND D.INSTT_ID = C.PROVD_INSTT_ID AND E.INSTT_ID = C.PROVD_INSTT_ID AND E.SYS_ID = C.PROVD_SYS_ID AND F.INSTT_ID = C.PROVD_INSTT_ID AND F.SYS_ID = C.PROVD_SYS_ID AND F.SVC_ID = C.PROVD_SVC_ID AND G.INSTT_ID = C.REQUST_INSTT_ID AND H.INSTT_ID = C.REQUST_INSTT_ID AND H.SYS_ID = C.REQUST_SYS_ID AND A.CNTC_ID = #cntcId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNTRSMRCVMNTRNG ( CNTC_ID,TEST_CLASS_NM,MNGR_NM,MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES, MNTRNG_STTUS,LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,LAST_UPDUSR_ID, CREAT_DT, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ) VALUES ( #cntcId#, #testClassNm#, #mngrNm#, #mngrEmailAddr#, #mntrngSttus#, SYSDATE, #lastUpdusrId#, SYSDATE, #frstRegisterId#, SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNTRSMRCVMNTRNG SET TEST_CLASS_NM = #testClassNm#, MNGR_NM = #mngrNm#, MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES = #mngrEmailAddr#, MNTRNG_STTUS = #mntrngSttus#, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE, CREAT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE CNTC_ID = #cntcId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT A.CNTC_ID , A.CNTC_NM , A.CNTC_TY , A.PROVD_INSTT_ID , A.PROVD_SYS_ID , A.PROVD_SVC_ID , A.REQUST_INSTT_ID , A.REQUST_SYS_ID , C1.INSTT_NM PROVD_INSTT_NM , D1.SYS_NM PROVD_SYS_NM , E.SVC_NM PROVD_SVC_NM , C2.INSTT_NM REQUST_INSTT_NM , D2.SYS_NM REQUST_SYS_NM FROM COMTNSYSTEMCNTC A , COMTNCNTCINSTT C1 , COMTNCNTCINSTT C2 , COMTNCNTCSYSTEM D1 , COMTNCNTCSYSTEM D2 , COMTNCNTCSERVICE E WHERE A.PROVD_INSTT_ID = C1.INSTT_ID AND A.PROVD_INSTT_ID = D1.INSTT_ID AND A.PROVD_SYS_ID = D1.SYS_ID AND A.PROVD_INSTT_ID = E.INSTT_ID AND A.PROVD_SYS_ID = E.SYS_ID AND A.PROVD_SVC_ID = E.SVC_ID AND A.REQUST_INSTT_ID = C2.INSTT_ID AND A.REQUST_INSTT_ID = D2.INSTT_ID AND A.REQUST_SYS_ID = D2.SYS_ID
A.CNTC_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY A.CNTC_ID ASC ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNSYSTEMCNTC A , COMTNCNTCINSTT C1 , COMTNCNTCINSTT C2 , COMTNCNTCSYSTEM D1 , COMTNCNTCSYSTEM D2 , COMTNCNTCSERVICE E WHERE A.PROVD_INSTT_ID = C1.INSTT_ID AND A.PROVD_INSTT_ID = D1.INSTT_ID AND A.PROVD_SYS_ID = D1.SYS_ID AND A.PROVD_INSTT_ID = E.INSTT_ID AND A.PROVD_SYS_ID = E.SYS_ID AND A.PROVD_SVC_ID = E.SVC_ID AND A.REQUST_INSTT_ID = C2.INSTT_ID AND A.REQUST_INSTT_ID = D2.INSTT_ID AND A.REQUST_SYS_ID = D2.SYS_ID
A.CNTC_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTHTRSMRCVMNTRNGLOGINFO ( LOG_ID, CNTC_ID,TEST_CLASS_NM,MNGR_NM,MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES, MNTRNG_STTUS,LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,LAST_UPDUSR_ID, CREAT_DT, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, LOG_INFO ) VALUES ( #logId#, #cntcId#, #testClassNm#, #mngrNm#, #mngrEmailAddr#, #mntrngSttus#, SYSDATE, #lastUpdusrId#, SYSDATE, #frstRegisterId#, SYSDATE, #logInfo# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT A.LOG_ID, A.CNTC_ID, A.TEST_CLASS_NM, A.MNGR_NM, A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES, A.MNTRNG_STTUS, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREAT_DT, A.LOG_INFO, B.CODE_NM MNTRNG_STTUS_NM, C.CNTC_NM, D.INSTT_NM PROVD_INSTT_NM, E.SYS_NM PROVD_SYS_NM, F.SVC_NM PROVD_SVC_NM, G.INSTT_NM REQUST_INSTT_NM, H.SYS_NM REQUST_SYS_NM FROM COMTHTRSMRCVMNTRNGLOGINFO A, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B, COMTNSYSTEMCNTC C, COMTNCNTCINSTT D, COMTNCNTCSYSTEM E, COMTNCNTCSERVICE F, COMTNCNTCINSTT G, COMTNCNTCSYSTEM H WHERE B.CODE_ID = 'COM046' AND A.MNTRNG_STTUS = B.CODE AND A.CNTC_ID = C.CNTC_ID AND D.INSTT_ID = C.PROVD_INSTT_ID AND E.INSTT_ID = C.PROVD_INSTT_ID AND E.SYS_ID = C.PROVD_SYS_ID AND F.INSTT_ID = C.PROVD_INSTT_ID AND F.SYS_ID = C.PROVD_SYS_ID AND F.SVC_ID = C.PROVD_SVC_ID AND G.INSTT_ID = C.REQUST_INSTT_ID AND H.INSTT_ID = C.REQUST_INSTT_ID AND H.SYS_ID = C.REQUST_SYS_ID
TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') >= #searchKeywordFrom#
TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') <= #searchKeywordTo#
C.CNTC_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
A.CNTC_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
A.MNGR_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY A.LOG_ID DESC ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTHTRSMRCVMNTRNGLOGINFO A, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B, COMTNSYSTEMCNTC C, COMTNCNTCINSTT D, COMTNCNTCSYSTEM E, COMTNCNTCSERVICE F, COMTNCNTCINSTT G, COMTNCNTCSYSTEM H WHERE B.CODE_ID = 'COM046' AND A.MNTRNG_STTUS = B.CODE AND A.CNTC_ID = C.CNTC_ID AND D.INSTT_ID = C.PROVD_INSTT_ID AND E.INSTT_ID = C.PROVD_INSTT_ID AND E.SYS_ID = C.PROVD_SYS_ID AND F.INSTT_ID = C.PROVD_INSTT_ID AND F.SYS_ID = C.PROVD_SYS_ID AND F.SVC_ID = C.PROVD_SVC_ID AND G.INSTT_ID = C.REQUST_INSTT_ID AND H.INSTT_ID = C.REQUST_INSTT_ID AND H.SYS_ID = C.REQUST_SYS_ID
TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') >= #searchKeywordFrom#
TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') <= #searchKeywordTo#
C.CNTC_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
A.CNTC_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
A.MNGR_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT A.LOG_ID, A.CNTC_ID, A.TEST_CLASS_NM, A.MNGR_NM, A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES, A.MNTRNG_STTUS, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREAT_DT, A.LOG_INFO, B.CODE_NM MNTRNG_STTUS_NM, C.CNTC_NM, D.INSTT_NM PROVD_INSTT_NM, E.SYS_NM PROVD_SYS_NM, F.SVC_NM PROVD_SVC_NM, G.INSTT_NM REQUST_INSTT_NM, H.SYS_NM REQUST_SYS_NM FROM COMTHTRSMRCVMNTRNGLOGINFO A, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B, COMTNSYSTEMCNTC C, COMTNCNTCINSTT D, COMTNCNTCSYSTEM E, COMTNCNTCSERVICE F, COMTNCNTCINSTT G, COMTNCNTCSYSTEM H WHERE B.CODE_ID = 'COM046' AND A.MNTRNG_STTUS = B.CODE AND A.CNTC_ID = C.CNTC_ID AND D.INSTT_ID = C.PROVD_INSTT_ID AND E.INSTT_ID = C.PROVD_INSTT_ID AND E.SYS_ID = C.PROVD_SYS_ID AND F.INSTT_ID = C.PROVD_INSTT_ID AND F.SYS_ID = C.PROVD_SYS_ID AND F.SVC_ID = C.PROVD_SVC_ID AND G.INSTT_ID = C.REQUST_INSTT_ID AND H.INSTT_ID = C.REQUST_INSTT_ID AND H.SYS_ID = C.REQUST_SYS_ID AND A.LOG_ID = #logId#
